rules.name: Combat Doctrines
rules.lore: The Codex Astartes has proven its worth as a superb treatise on warfare over countless battlefields, and has remained so even after ten thousand years. Many Adeptus Astartes hold its wisdom in awe, and exemplify its teachings, employing a flexible set of combat doctrines to eliminate their enemy. Few opponents can withstand the fury of such an onslaught.
rules.text: At the start of the Battle Round, you can select one of the Combat Doctrines listed below. Until the end of the Battle Round, that Combat Doctrine is active and its effects apply to all +Adeptus Astartes+ units from your army. You can only select each Combat Doctrine once per battle.

options.name: Devastator Doctrine
options.lore: The Codex Stellar explains in detail the strategic value of overwhelming firepower applied to key targets while advancing into position in order to eliminate threats and create tactical openings.
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units may Move, Advance and Shoot in a single Activation.

options.name: Tactical Doctrine
options.lore: As the warring armies close upon one another and vicious fire-fights erupt, the Codex lays out strategies for swiftly seizing the initiative and combining versatility with firepower.
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units may Fight and then Move an extra d6 inches.

options.name: Assault Doctrine
options.lore: The Codex Stellar leaves no doubt that the killing blow in most engagements must be delivered with a decisive close-quarters strike. It presents plentiful tactical means to achieve this end.
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units may Move, Advance and Charge in a single Activation.

spells.name: Scion of the Codex
spells.effect: Select one friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, you may re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

spells.name: Fury of the Ancients
spells.effect: Select one visible enemy Model within 18". Draw a line between any part of this model's base and any part of the selected model's base (or hull). The selected model's unit, and every other enemy unit that this line passes over or through, suffers 1 Mortal Damage

spells.name: Psychic Fortress
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your +Adeptus Astartes+ units within 6" have a 5++ Invulnerable Save.

strategems.name: Shield of Disgust
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit has declared a Ranged or Melee attack
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, enemy units attacking the target unit have -1 to Wound Rolls.

strategems.name: Sword of Hatred
strategems.when: Upon Activation of a friendly unit
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has +1 to its Hit Rolls.
